original_title: Bob Hope: The Road to Laughter
overview: The documentary Bob Hope: The Road to Laughter contains numerous clips from the film and television work of the beloved entertainer. These snippets are intercut with interview footage featuring people who worked with Hope as well as film historian Leonard Maltin who provides a context for Hope's career. ~ Perry Seibert, Rovi
tagline: Featuring the greatest moments from Bob Hope's best-loved movie classics!
title: Bob Hope: The Road to Laughter
